a_what_is_labari: Labari bụ ikpo okwu mbụ na Afrịka ebe ị nwere ike ịgụ, gee ntị, maọbụ lelee akwụkwọ. Ma ọ bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ, ncheta, ma ọ bụ akụkọ ụmụaka, Labari na-eweta mgbanwe site n’inye ụdị ederede, olu, na vidiyo—n’otu ebe.
a_when_launch: Labari ga-ebido na July 2025. Ị nwere ike debanye aha ugbua ka ị banye na ndepụta ndị ga-eru n’ihu.
q_cost: Ego ole ka Labari ga na-eri?
a_cost: Labari ga-enwe atụmatụ ndebanye dị mfe na-enye gị ohere ịgụ, gee ntị, maọbụ lelee. A ga-akọwa ọnụ ahịa mgbe e mepụtara ya.
q_where_use: Ebee ka m nwere ike iji Labari?
a_where_use: Ị nwere ike iji Labari na ekwentị gị, mbadamba, kọmpụta, maọbụ telivishọn. Ngwa a ga-adị na iOS, Android, na webụsaịtị.
a_kind_content: Labari ga-enwe nnukwu ọba akwụkwọ nke Afrịka na ụwa nile— akụkọ ihe mere eme, azụmahịa, okwukwe, enyemaka onwe, egwu, akụkọ ụmụaka, wdg.
a_download: Ee! Mgbe e mepụtara Labari, ị nwere ike ibudata akwụkwọ, audiobooks, na vidiyo maka ilekọta n’enweghị ịntanetị.
q_suitable_kids: Labari ọ dị mma maka ụmụaka?
a_suitable_kids: Ee. Labari ga-enye mpaghara pụrụ iche maka ụmụaka, ya na akụkọ na-akọwa, na-akụziri, na na-atọ ụtọ.
a_sign_up: Ị nwere ike debanye ugbua na webụsaịtị anyị iji nweta mmelite na ịbanye mbụ.
q_stay_updated: Kedu ka m ga-esi nọrọ n’ụwa mmelite?
a_stay_updated: Soro Labari na mgbasa ozi ọha na eze ma debanye aha na akwụkwọ ozi anyị.
explore_title: Ihe ọzọ kpatara isonye na Labari
explore_1_title: Nwee Labari n'ụdị ngwaọrụ ọ bụla
explore_1_text: Gụọ, gee ntị, maọbụ lelee akwụkwọ gị n’ụdị TV, mbadamba, kọmpụta, maọbụ ekwentị—oge ọ bụla, ebe ọ bụla.
explore_2_title: Budata Akụkọ Maka Nchekwa N’enweghị Ịntanetị
explore_2_text: Zọpụta akwụkwọ—ederede, olu, maọbụ vidiyo—ma nwee ha mgbe ị nweghị ịntanetị.
explore_3_text: Ma ọ bụ na ị na-efe njem, na-ezuru ike, maọbụ na ezumike—Labari na-enye gị ohere inweta akụkọ n’ụlọ gị niile.
explore_4_text: Nyefee ụmụaka ebe nchekwa ha nwere akụkọ ha hụrụ n’anya—gụọ ọnụ, vidiyo na-akpali akpali, na audiobooks ha.
discover_text: Wunye n’ọba akwụkwọ anyị jupụtara na akwụkwọ vidiyo, nke nwere akwụkwọ ọhụrụ na akụkọ oge ochie. Ma ị bụ onye hụrụ fim n’anya maọbụ akwụkwọ, anyị nwere ihe maka gị.
hero_headline_2: Gụọ ya, gee ntị, maọbụ lelee ya na Labari.
hero_subtext_1: Labari bụ ikpo okwu mbụ na Afrịka ebe akụkọ na-esi n’obi pụta
